oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Stock certificates
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Stock certificate of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition Company, guaranteeing a $5.00 share to the holder. Pictured on the certificate are the Parthenon and images of four prominent Tennesseans: John Sevier, Andrew Jackson, James K. Polk, and Andrew Johnson.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition Collection, 1895-1900
